statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, completion_date, status FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule;
SELECT project_name, project_id, status, start_date, completion_date FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND status = 'In Progress';
SELECT status, project_name, project_id FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, status FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE status = 'In Progress' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingProjectSchedule WHERE status = 'Completed' OR status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date, completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM Project_Tasks WHERE task_status = 'InProgress' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-10-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_description FROM Green_Building_Projects JOIN Project_Tasks ON Green_Building_Projects.project_id = Project_Tasks.project_id WHERE task_status = 'Incomplete';

SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM Green_Building_Projects LEFT JOIN Project_Tasks ON Green_Building_Projects.project_id = Project_Tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 5;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE project_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM green_building_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date FROM green_building_projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(task_id) AS num_tasks FROM green_building_projects JOIN project_tasks ON green_building_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';

SELECT project_name, task_name, assignee FROM green_building_projects JOIN project_tasks ON green_building_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id JOIN task_assignments ON project_tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM green_building_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM green_building_projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, task_name, task_description FROM green_building_projects JOIN project_tasks ON green_building_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_tasks WHERE estimated_duration > 5 ORDER BY task_name DESC;

SELECT project_name, assignee, assigned_date FROM green_building_projects JOIN project_tasks ON green_building_projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id JOIN task_assignments ON project_tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM task ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, completed FROM milestone WHERE completed = true;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_member ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM task WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_member WHERE role = 'Developer' AND project_id = 3;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, completed FROM milestone WHERE task_id = 4 AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, description FROM Task_List WHERE phase_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Task_Assignment WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, department ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Green_Building_Projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, description FROM Task_List WHERE phase_id = 3 AND task_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY task_id DESC;

SELECT employee_name, department, task_name FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Task_Assignment ta ON e.employee_id = ta.employee_id INNER JOIN Task_List tl ON ta.task_id = tl.task_id WHERE ta.due_date < '2022-10-01';

SELECT project_name, COUNT(phase_id) AS num_phases FROM Green_Building_Projects gp LEFT JOIN Construction_Phases cp ON gp.project_id = cp.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING num_phases > 2 ORDER BY num_phases DESC;
